p: On 20â€“27 August 2018, mosquito specimens were collected in five villages of Pingluo County, the county with the most JE cases in Shizuishan City. A total of 24,900 mosquitoes were collected belonging to three species: Culex. tritaeniorhynchus (69.9%; 17,400/24,900), Culex pipiens pallens (3800), and Armigeres obturbans (3700) ( Table 3).
